verbs.description: [ARG0: The Washington Post ’s editorial board] [ARGM-TMP: on Monday] [V: slammed] [ARG1: President Donald Trump] [ARG2: for attacking Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau following the Group of Seven ( G-7 ) summit while gloating over his " historic meeting " with North Korea dictator Kim Jong Un] .

The Washington Post ’s editorial board on Monday slammed [ARG0: President Donald Trump] for [V: attacking] [ARG1: Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau] [ARGM-TMP: following the Group of Seven ( G-7 ) summit] [ARGM-TMP: while gloating over his " historic meeting " with North Korea dictator Kim Jong Un] .

The Washington Post ’s editorial board on Monday slammed President Donald Trump for attacking Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau [V: following] [ARG2: the Group of Seven ( G-7 ) summit] while gloating over his " historic meeting " with North Korea dictator Kim Jong Un .
